original_title: 僕を助けてくれる幼なじみがいじめっこに犯されているのを見て勃起した
overview: Luna, my childhood friend who has always helped me when I was bullied. You came to help me again today! But this time the opponent is bad ... Become a substitute for me and become obscene! Now it's my turn to muster up the courage and help! Huh... I... have an erection. Even though my important benefactor is getting sick. …I want to see more, cry more. Oh... how cool. I can't believe I can see my beloved Luna like this... I just realized... I like the way you are being raped w benefactor NTR! Scum erection!
title: I Got An Erection When I Saw My Childhood Friend Who Helps Me Being Fucked By A Bully Luna Tsukino
